name: epigrammatic
content:
Add to word list

literature
  specialized relating to a short saying or poem that expresses an idea in a clever, funny way: His poems are often epigrammatic and political. Epigrammatic quotes from Virgil that have entered the English language include "Fortune favours the brave." Related word
epigram
formal expressing yourself using very few words, in a clever, funny way: He speaks with epigrammatic brevity. an epigrammatic riposte Synonym
pithy
